custom-sql.sql: select im.itemMasterSid, im.itemId, im.itemNo, im.itemName, im.itemDesc, im.itemType, im.itemStatus, im.recordLockStatus, im.itemCode, im.packageSize, im.upps, im.itemStartDate, im.itemEndDate, im.labelerCode, form.description, strength.description, im.primaryUom, im.secondaryUom, im.itemClass, im.pediatricExclusiveStartDate, im.pediatricExclusiveEndDate, im.clottingFactorStartDate, im.clottingFactorEndDate, bm.brandName, im.ndc8, im.ndc9, therapy.description, im.batchId
